message:
SYSTEM: Fpriyatna-oeg-20141002.pdf: Página 38
(FW2) Sneak Peek of Horizontal Approach
●Use mappings NF1
●Use self-join elimination
●Without reification
●Generate multiple tables, not a single triples 
table in the view
●
PDepartment = SELECT ?s ?ex_name ?ex_department WHERE {
?s rdf:type ex:Department .
?s ex:name  ?ex_name . }
●
PEmployee = SELECT ?s ?ex_name ?ex_fullname ?ex_department WHERE {
?s rdf:type ex:Employee .
?s ex:name  ?ex_name .
?s ex:fullname ?ex_fullname .
?s ex:worksIn ?ex_worksIn. }
speaker: SYSTEM
